content: परिवेदनं {@--1@} The marriage of a younger brother before the elder. {@--2@} Marriage in general. {@--3@} Complete or accurate knowledge. {@--4@} Gain, acquisition. {@--5@} Maintaining the household fire (अग्न्याधान); <ls>Ms. 11. 61.</ls> {@--6@} Pervasion on all sides, universal pervasion or existence. {@--7@} Discussion. {@--8@} Misery, pain --ना {@--1@} Shrewdness, wit. {@--2@} Prudence, foresight.
